Title: Mandates acceptance of the New York city identity card as a primary form of identification at all covered entities
Summary: Enacts the pro-banking act to mandate acceptance of the New York city identity card as a primary form of identification at all covered entities, including all banking organizations, foreign banking corporations, and interstate branches.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the banking law, in relation to mandating acceptance of the New York city identity card as a primary form of identification at all covered entities
